author: jgomes
msg: Minor code cleanup to use the auto-generated accessor function idiom.

author: jgomes
msg: Set the failover timeout to be 100ms past the maximum timeout period. The thread will be pulsed if it connects. Otherwise, it just needs to wait. It doesn't need to keep checking every 100ms.
